# coinflow


## 1- python example

### installing 

```
pip install coinflow
```

### simple example

```
from dataflow import dataflowClient

cf = dataflowClient(API_KEY="test")
``` 

## 2- R example

### installing 

```
install.packages("dataflow")
```

### simple example

```
library(dataflow)

cf = dataflowClient(API_KEY="test")
```
